target_switch.name: Target Switch
target_switch.desc: Parrying an opponent then hitting someone else makes your next mantra free.

foolish_outburst.name: Foolish Outburst
foolish_outburst.desc:
Blocking or parrying a vent will absorb the Tempo cost of the vent. A Tactician steadies the course of battle.
[*Absorbs 20% to 40% of the vent's Tempo between 20 INT and 50 INT.]

hard_read.name: Hard Read
hard_read.desc: Hitting your opponent during a feint will cause them to be dazed.

water_off_a_ducks_back.name: Water off a Duck's Back
water_off_a_ducks_back.desc: Venting will shift any elemental status effects affecting you onto those hit by your vent. Will also remove potion splash statuses on vent.

punishing_blow.name: Punishing Blow
punishing_blow.desc: [Heavy Weapons] Daze opponents for 1s when you interrupt their Basic Attack with your own.
